lemma EWHILEIT_rule[refine_vcg]: assumes WF: "wf R" and I0: "I s\<^sub>0" and IS: "\<And>s. \<lbrakk>I s; b s; (s,s\<^sub>0)\<in>R\<^sup>*\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> f s \<le> ESPEC E (\<lambda>s'. I s' \<and> (s', s) \<in> R)" and IMP: "\<And>s. \<lbrakk>I s; \<not> b s; (s,s\<^sub>0)\<in>R\<^sup>*\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> \<Phi> s" shows "EWHILEIT I b f s\<^sub>0 \<le> ESPEC E \<Phi>"
